title: Payfunnels User Terms and Conditions
content:
I. Personally-Identifiable Information and Non-Personally Identifiable Information.

Payfunnels, LLC (also referred to herein as “Payfunnels”) may collect two different types of information, Personally Identifiable Information (“PII”) and Non-Personally Identifiable Information (“Non-PII”). PII is information that identifies you as an individual – for example, your name, address, telephone number, e-mail address, credit card information, billing address and shipping information. Non-PII is aggregated information, demographic information, IP addresses, the computer systems you are using, user behavior data from web interaction metrics tools and other information that does not reveal your specific identity. PII and Non-PII may be collected anytime you access or use a Payfunnels website. PII and Non-PII may also be collected by Payfunnels during in-person discussions, telephone conversations, and electronic or other written communications. Payfunnels also collects information via cookies; blocking cookies may render you unable to access certain Payfunnels products, services, or websites.

Payfunnels uses PII to respond to your inquiries, provide you with services you have requested, keep you informed of services Payfunnels thinks may be of interest to you, otherwise personalize your experience with Payfunnels, improve our website, improve customer service, process transactions, send periodic emails, administer a contest, promotion, survey, site feature, prevent fraud, for dispute resolution and other reasons. Payfunnels does not sell or lease PII about you to others. Payfunnels may share PII with Payfunnels affiliates and third parties contracting with Payfunnels to provide services to you, e.g., financial institutions. Payfunnels may also share PII when required by law, or when you have expressly requested Payfunnels to do so. Payfunnels reserves the right to disclose and use your PII if Payfunnels believes it is necessary to: (a) respond to legal process, e.g., a subpoena; (b) respond to a law enforcement agency’s request; (c) enforce the Terms; or (d) protect the rights, privacy, safety, property, or operations of Payfunnels or third parties;

Because Non-PII does not personally identify You, Payfunnels reserves the right to use and disclose to third parties Non-PII for any purpose.

Payfunnels maintains reasonable physical, administrative and technical safeguards to protect PII from loss, misuse, or unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration or destruction. Payfunnels enforces its Privacy Policy via self-assessment.

Payfunnels uses data from Stripe for the connected user’s account. All sensitive credit card information is stored in Stripe. Please refer to Stripe Privacy Policy.

Payfunnels uses Mixpanel to track user experience and audit logs. Please refer to Mixpanel  Privacy Policy

By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of your information as set forth in this Privacy Policy. If Payfunnels decide to change this Privacy Policy, which Payfunnels may do at any time without notice to you, Payfunnels will post those changes on this page. By continuing to use the Service after Payfunnels have posted the changes, you agree to and accept such changes. You should periodically check the Service for changes to this Privacy Policy.

II. Links to or From Other Sites.

Except where expressly stated by Payfunnels, Payfunnels is not affiliated or associated with operators of any third party websites that link to or are linked from any Payfunnels-maintained website. Payfunnels disclaims any responsibility for the accuracy or content of information found on third party websites that link to or are linked from any Payfunnels website. Payfunnels disclaims any responsibility for the security of any information (including without limitation credit card and personally identifiable information (“PII”)) that you may provide to any third party. Payfunnels reserves the right, at any time and in its sole and absolute discretion, to block links to any Payfunnels-maintained website through technological or other means without prior notice.

III. Information; Registration; User Names and Passwords

As a Payfunnels website user, You will be required to create an account with Payfunnels. You warrant that the information you provide Payfunnels is truthful and accurate, and that you are not impersonating another person. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any password you may use to access your Payfunnels account, and you agree not to transfer your password or User name, or lend or otherwise transfer your use of or access to your account, to any third party. You are fully responsible for all transactions with, and information conveyed to, Payfunnels under your account. You agree to immediately notify Payfunnels of any unauthorized use of your password or User name or any other breach of security related to your account. You agree that Payfunnels is not liable, and you will hold Payfunnels harmless, for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with any of the foregoing obligations.

IV. How do we protect your information.

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. We offer the use of a secure server. All supplied sensitive/credit information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and then encrypted into our Payment gateway providers database only to be accessible by those authorized with special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. After a transaction, your private information (credit cards, social security numbers, financials, etc.) is never kept on file. We cannot, however, ensure or warrant the absolute security of any information you transmit to Payfunnels or guarantee that your information on the Service may not be accessed, disclosed, altered, or destroyed by a breach of any of our physical, technical, or managerial safeguards.

V. Release/Authorization to Use Photographs.

You grant Payfunnels permission to use any and all photographs, or video or audio or digital recordings, taken by Payfunnels or its agents or employees, or submitted by You to Payfunnels (hereinafter “Photographs”) in any Media (including print, internet, film, television and no matter how distributed or published) for any purpose, which may include, but shall not be limited to, advertising, promotion, marketing and packaging of Payfunnels or any product or service sold and marketed by Payfunnels. You agree that this authorization to use Photographs may be assigned by Payfunnels to any other party. You agree that that the Photographs may be combined with other Photographs, sounds, text and graphics, and that the Photographs may be manipulated, cropped, altered or modified in Payfunnels’ sole discretion. You agree not to charge a royalty or fee, and not to make any other monetary assessment against Payfunnels in exchange for this Release and Assignment. You hereby release and forever discharge Payfunnels from any and all liability and from any damages you may suffer as a result of the use of the Photographs. You further acknowledge and agree that this Release is binding upon your heirs and assigns. You agree that this Release is irrevocable.

VI. Online Privacy Policy Only

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Payfunnels. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

VII. Your Consent

By using our site, registering an account, or making a purchase, you consent to this Privacy Policy.

IX. Disclosure
Our app complies with the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements, for accessing Google Calendar and Google Meet links. For more details, please review our Privacy Policy and the Google API Services User Data Policy

excerpt: Welcome to Payfunnels. We look forward to helping You grow Your on-line sales beyond anything You have done before, so You can take Your business as far as You can imagine. This Agreement sets forth Your rights and obligations as a Payfunnels User. By clicking “I Agree,” You indicate that You have read and understood this Agreement and You will be bound by its Terms.
